attributes.review: This app almost made me go extinct!! He has caused nothing but tragedy to the U.S. Nation and that’s on perionna. This app is very much clownery. Don’t do it boo it’s not worth it. #BERNIE2020 periodt.

this app is truly the worst.. i thought it was a place to make donald trump lose the rally, but instead it’s to JOIN his campaign !!! very disappointed.
it has USED my location when not open. i think this is an awful app.

attributes.review: i tried downloading the app and it took over four hours !!! i wanted to see what our 🧚🏻🧚🏻‍♂️racist homophobic president 🧚🏻✨💫 was up to but for the longest time i couldn't   😤😤 anyways if i could give it zero stars i would ❤️ but i cant so one star it is 🤭🤭 teheE

attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: When I first opened up the app, I got a white screen. So I closed out of it and restarted it, and got the same white screen. I did this 5 more times and it never worked. The app doesn't even open.
attributes.title: It doesn't even work

attributes.review: i don’t even know where to begin!! this app took five days to download, and when it finally did and i was able to open it, it sent my pug into a coma that he still hasn’t awoken from! it’s been 3 years!! also, it asks you what your favorite fruit is, and if you say anything other than orange, (the presidents distant tribe) it makes your phone slice your fingers off!! what a horrible way to spread your campaign😒
attributes.title: the worst app on the app store hands down.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app looking for a reason to vote for trump again but after I downloaded it my phone started glitching and crashing and I started getting a lot of ads about this app it is really haunting me!
attributes.title: It ruined my life!

attributes.review: This app is sooooo BAD !!!!!! It took 6 days to download and when it downloaded I saw Donald Trump face and I passed out and had to go to the hospital and stay for 7 days. Is that what this app is made for to make people pass out !!!!!! And if it is then people should never download this app.
attributes.title: Be ware

attributes.review: This app is so terribly made. It made my phone glitch so badly that it wouldn’t turn on for days. Also when I did get it to turn on my phone screen blacked out when I try to delete it.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
